fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.sig3d.io.obj

Class OBJMaterial

  • Object
    • SceneGraphObject
      • NodeComponent
        • Material
          • OBJMaterial

  • public class OBJMaterial
extends Material
    A material with additional parameters useful for raytracing rendering.
    Author:
    Emmanuel Puybaret
